Kym Buchanan is Assistant Professor of Education at University of Wisconsin, Stevens Point. He has been an English teacher, zombie slayer, and starship captain. He studies motivation and the fuzzy line between real and unreal (e.g., in video games). More: KymBuchanan.org
Perry Cook is Professor of Education at University of Wisconsin, Stevens Point. He has been a science teacher, an unpaid, unrecognized fishing guide and motivational speaker. More: www4.uwsp.edu/education/pcook
